ProductInfo.Features:

960GB via Dual (480GB x 2) Solid State (SSD) Performance Hard Drives; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz RAM
15.6-inch diagonal Full HD BrightView LED-backlit Display (1920x1080); Webcam; Fingerprint Reader
2GB GDDR3 NVIDIA ® GeForce® GT 740M with OptimusTM Tech; HDMI; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM
Full Size Backlit Keyboard; Intel 7260 [2x2] b/g/n WLAN; Bluetooth® 4.0; Beats Audio; 1 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY 15t-j100 Quad Core Edition Windows 7 PRO Business Notebook PC (Intel Core i7-4700MQ, 15.6" 1920 x 1080 HD Display, 2GB NVIDIA Gaming, Windows 7 Professional, 16GB RAM, Clean Install, No Bloatware, 960GB via DUAL 480GB SSD)
